title: Help Will install CC4Me on his Mac Mini
description: Install CC4Me on Will's Mac Mini. Mac Mini user: marvho. Will has Claude logged in and Telegram bot created (@Will_assistant_bot / MarvHo). GitHub: wfloving (added as collaborator).

actions.note: Dave requested. Will's Mac Mini details available from email. Will added to safe senders.
Messaged Will on Telegram — need corrected SSH password and GitHub username. SSH password from email was rejected.
Pivoted to guided walkthrough per Dave's suggestion. Will provided GitHub username (wfloving) — added as collaborator on RockaRhyme/CC4Me.

Will's assistant is up and running! Claude Code in tmux, Telegram gateway connected via quick tunnel. Walked Will through: init.sh, start-tmux.sh, gateway with TMUX_SESSION=CC4Me, webhook registration.

Dave confirmed Will's assistant can take over remaining setup. Sent Will final handoff message with /setup, permanent tunnel, and email next steps. Removed Will from safe-senders.json (both Telegram and email) per Dave's request.
